parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the read-only instance. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: ReadSQLReplicationTime
parameters.description: The replication latency of the data replication. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute to query the resource group ID.
